thread.title: Kids Today Are Way Less Scary Than They Used To Be
thread.title_full: Kids Today Are Way Less Scary Than They Used To Be

author: Kevin Drum
title: Kids Today Are Way Less Scary Than They Used To Be
text:
Kids Today Are Way Less Scary Than They Used To Be Kevin Drum Mar. 6, 2017 9:45 AM Email 
This is apropos of nothing in particular, but a couple of days ago I happened to run across this chart on the Justice Department website: 
Since 1996, arrests of juveniles have fallen by two-thirds. Arrests for violent crimes have fallen by more than two-thirds. Bottom line: Kids today are way better behaved and way less scary than they were in the 90s. One of these days we ought to start acting like we know this. Get the scoop, straight from Mother Jones.
